@graph.title: Advanced nanomaterials : synthesis, properties, and applications
abstract: 1. Recent studies of spin dynamics in ferromagnetic nanoparticles / D.S. Schmool -- 2. Novel magnetic carbon biocomposites / B. Kalska-Szostko, M. Rogowska, A. Pigiel, and D. Satula -- 3. AuNPs and biosensors : a hand to hand journey / Suman Singh, V.K. Meena, D.V.S. Jain, and M.L. Singla -- 4. Industrially relevant nanoparticles : hematite : its synthesis, functionalization, and applications / Marimuthu Nidhin, Kalarical Janardhanan Sreeram, and Balachandran Unni Nair -- 5. Novel Dielectric Nanoparticles (DNP) doped nano-engineered glass based optical fiber for fiber laser / M.C. Paul, A.V. Kir'yanov, S. Das, M. Pal, S.K. Bhadra, Yu. O. Barmenkov, A.A. Martinez-Gamez, J.L. Lucio Martinez, S. Yoo, and J.K. Sahu -- 6. ZnO nanostructures and its luminescent properties / P.M. Aneesh and M.K. Jayaraj -- 7. Thin film and nanostructured multiferroic materials / B. Raneesh and Nandakumar Kalarikkal -- 8. Current advances in nanomedicine : applications in clinical medicine and surgery / Indu Raj, Vinod Kumar P., and Nandakumar Kalarikkal -- 9. Study of plasma induced gas phase growth mechanism of TiO2/Al2O3 multilayer thin films and its correlation with its morphological and electrical properties / P. Laha, A.B. Panda, S.K. Mahapatra, P.K. Barhai, A.K. Das, and I. Banerjee -- 10. Role of interlayer interaction on mechanical properties of carbon nanotubes / Keka Talukdar and Apurba Krishna Mitra -- 11. Recent advances in nanomedicine : applications in diagnosis and therapeutics / Sandhya Gopalakrishnan, Kannan Vaidyanathan, and Nandakumar Kalarikkal -- 12. Role of nanogrooves on the performance of ultra-fine grained titanium as a bio-implant / P. Priyanka, K. Sujith, A.M. Asha, Manitha Nair, S.V. Nair, R. Biswas, T.N. Kim, and A. Balakrishnan -- 13. Super-paramagnetic iron oxide nanoparticles (spions) as nano-flotillas for hyperthermia : a paradigm for cancer theranostics / Madhuri Sharon, Goldie Oza, Arvind Gupta, and Sunil Pandey -- 14. Sustained and responsive release of corrosion inhibiting species from multilayered assembly of zinc phosphomolybdate containers with application in anticorrosive paint coating formulation / S.E. Karekar, B.A. Bhanvase, and S.H. Sonawane -- 15. Emerging multifunctional nanomaterials for solar energy extraction / Mayank Bhushan, Nirmal Ghosh O.S., and A. Kasi Viswanath
